//--------- Serching----------------
var ACTIONS={SEARCH_INPUT:"Update query text from serach component",CLEAR_SERACH:"Clear search string and serach result set",SEARCH_START:"Fire seraching request",SET_SEARCH_RESULTS:"Update search results in store"};export{ACTIONS as SEARCHING_ACTIONS};export function searchInput(text){return{type:ACTIONS.SEARCH_INPUT,text:text};}export function searchStart(text,source,limit){return{type:ACTIONS.SEARCH_START,text:text,source:source,limit:limit};}export function setSearchResults(results){return{type:ACTIONS.SET_SEARCH_RESULTS,results:results};}export function clearSearch(){return{type:ACTIONS.CLEAR_SERACH};}
